data.name: Influences RPG
data.detailed_description:
Description

The Game Universe

Each creature, entity and place, is reinforced by the 12, fighting for their influences' supremacy. There is 3 known domains or realms, were exist everythings :
- Sphere : for physical worlds and living beings that will be born and die.
- Sheol : for ghosts, recent dead creatures that become spirits again.
- Ether : for Sparks (souls). Some stay in their paradis, others travel, others are called Divine.

The Start
An ancient Spark (a soul) falls in a battle against a mysterious force. It wakes up without memories, without his power like if it is a new-born. For you, it starts here. Fact : you were the first victim of this new threat and you were.... really powerful…

The player
As an ancient elemental Spark, you have one main Nature and 11 others. You will travel through our known mythologies and beliefs. Discover Hell, Asgard, Sanctuaries. Incarnate you on Earth or elsewhere. Gain experience, friends, memories and spread your main Nature everywhere to be more powerful and face the growing threat that misses to end you for good.

The Theme
Each map has a different ambiance, music style, and culture. You will discover sci-fi, medieval, fantasy, contemporary, post-apocalypse, horror, funny and more themes.

Features

Dynamique Worlds and adventure
Your actions and quests can change the Nature of a map that affects other players' maps. All creatures, spirits and players are empowered if their main Nature is the same as the map.


Gameplay (soul or creature)
As a soul you have a TPS view, you can fly, use spells etc. When Incarnate you have a FPS view, and are restricted by the physical laws. But Incarnate you gain more experiences.

Player's home to evolve and custom
Custom your personal land with scanned objects. Rest, level, change your skills and your combat style. But it is only there you can do that, choose wisely.

Combat, shape your style
Use powerful spells in the spirit worlds to fight or to affect physical worlds. Choos for each spell the way to use it : close, distance, effect over time, single target or area etc.

Apparences and Skins
Take the appearance of each creature which you incarnate. Also scan objects like a lightsaber and re-create them in your home and skin your weapon with.


Energy and Health
Using spells consumes your life care when you fight. You have an energy supply that can help you to heal, craft, change the map influence, construction, possess a creature etc.

Ability Tree
Unlocked abilities depend on the level of your 12 Natures. The more you will raise one or several, the more you will unlock powerful spells. Combine your abilities to win battles.

Secret Skills
Unlock, by luck maybe, secret skills, that will make the difference in the game. Imagine specific actions in specific places, you will obtain them.

Characteristics and Level
Each level, exchanges your affinity between 2 Natures. Add points in your 5 characteristics. Displayed info, maps access, dialogue options, spells, dommages, health all depend hardly on them.

Karma and decisions
All your decisions impact your adventure and mark your character’s Karama's card. It can be a burden. It shapes your mindset, how NPCs react, unlock quests, reduce your health etc.

Next after the first release

Equipment, Stuff and materials, Crafting, Jobs, Shops, Achievement, Visiting homes, Episodes, Dungeons, World Boss, Challenges, Quest creator for other players and more.
It is you guys that will decide which next steps you will need in the game.

data.short_description: A RPG in a single-player adventure infused with 12 elements like fire, water, time etc. Your actions influence your game and the map of other players. Travel to our mythologies, spirits worlds and incarnate in physical worlds to spread the influence of your Nature to prepare for the upcoming threat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 with 2GB Memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
